text: Easily one of ths NES greats. I do have to mention just how great the Netflix show is, which is largely based on this game. The first season was surprisingly good, but the second season was pure TV goodness. Even if you're not a fan of the games, chances are you will still enjoy it. And if you're like me, then you will appreciate the obvious respect the creators have for Castlevania and smile at some of the fan service.
author: SupraDarky
